col6: is this a URI-identified or blank-node resource vs. literal?
see British museum example for use of crm:P108i (clunky)
dcterms:medium would be better but the range can't be a literal
vcard:country-name, but assumes it's part of a structured address
The value needs to be an IRI, so that would involve minting a controlled vocabulary with IRIs for the techniques if there isn't one already.
if we want to use time ontology, see temple model
dcterms:created is a literal so can't use; dc:date possible; see Kerameikos for CIDOC-CRM example
